title: Never Lose Money
summary: Focus on safe investments first. Protect your money before chasing high returns.
example: If you invest $1000 in a high-risk stock vs a stable ETF, the risk of losing is higher with the stock.

title: Invest in What You Understand
summary: Stick to businesses you can comprehend.
example: Avoid complex derivatives if you donâ€™t fully understand them.
